name: Rerun
description:
In Rerun you must cunningly wield your adventurer's ever-evolving abilities or end up out of usages and doomed to an endless struggle. Using the environment to your advantage, position your chaotic adventurers to keep them safe and lure your foes into your devious traps that'll send them flying into lava!



Rerun plays like a combination of Into the Breach and Slay the Spire. Each playthrough a random dungeon map is generated which doubles as your skill tree, navigate the map and choose the perfect upgrades for your adventurers' abilities. And maybe.. be greedy and double down at certain levels to get extra rewards in preparation for the boss fights? Don't run out of ability usages though!

Features:

  • 21 Adventurer combinations, each providing new devious methods to bully foes.
  • Play through an ever-changing dungeon which doubles as your skill tree.
  • Choose from and equip over 80 wild upgrades.
  • Unlock 7 quirky adventurers with over 40 unique abilities and items.
  • Overcome 6 challenging boss encounters.
  • Daily Mode where each day you can play as Chad & Thad, two randomly generated adventurers.
